sentences.en: " Tom -- honest injun, now -- is it fun, or earnest? "
sentences.cn: “ 汤姆,你是开玩笑, 还是说真格的? ”

sentences.en: “Both sides are deeply in earnest, with passions that approximate those of civil war”(&b{Conor Cruise O'Brien})
sentences.cn: “双方都很坚决认真，象是鼓足劲要打一场内战”(&b{康纳·克鲁斯·奥布赖恩})

sentences.en: a rather earnest young man
sentences.cn: 相当认真的一个年轻人

sentences.en: an earnest desire to offer something useful to society
sentences.cn: 为社会做贡献的真诚愿望

sentences.en: an earnest young man
sentences.cn: 非常认真的年轻人

sentences.en: He is deaf to your earnest advice.
sentences.cn: 他听不进你的忠言.

sentences.en: He is earnest in his endeavors.
sentences.cn: 他热心努力.

sentences.en: Her earnest manner arrested me.
sentences.cn: 她那种热忱的态度引起了我的注意.

sentences.en: His expression is as earnest when he smiles as when he is arguing.
sentences.cn: 他不论笑的时候还是争论的时候表情都同样真诚。

sentences.en: His job as England manager begins in earnest now his World Cup campaign is in motion.
sentences.cn: 现在世界杯足球赛的征战工作已经展开，而他作为英格兰队主教练的工作也真正开始了。

sentences.en: I'm in deadly earnest.
sentences.cn: 我是非常认真的.

sentences.en: I'm sure he was in earnest when he said he wanted to marry her.
sentences.cn: 我相信他说想娶她是真心的.

sentences.en: It presented in satirical terms points made in earnest by Catholic writers.
sentences.cn: 它用讽刺的语言呈现了天主教作家郑重其事表明的观点。

sentences.en: Life is real and earnest.
sentences.cn: 人生是真实的、认真的.

sentences.en: Matthews was in earnest conversation with a young girl.
sentences.cn: 马修斯在和一个年轻姑娘认真地谈话。

sentences.en: No one could tell whether he was in earnest or in jest.
sentences.cn: 谁都不知道他是认真的还是在开玩笑。

sentences.en: settled down to study in earnest for the examination.
sentences.cn: 坚定决心认真坐下来复习准备考试

sentences.en: The race for the White House begins in earnest today.
sentences.cn: 入主白宫的角逐今天正式开始。

sentences.en: The words were earnest but they fell on deaf ears.
sentences.cn: 言者谆谆,听者藐藐.

sentences.en: Xiangzi was so much in earnest, the other became quite embarrassed.
sentences.cn: 祥子是那么诚恳, 弄得老头子有点不好意思了.

phrases.tran_cn: [古语]十分严肃地，一本正经地

trans.tran_en: if something starts happening in earnest, it begins properly – used when it was happening in a small or informal way before
